member.name: P:FubarDev.FtpServer.SimplePasvOptions.PasvMinPort
member.summary: Gets or sets minimum port number to use for passive ftp.

member.name: P:FubarDev.FtpServer.SimplePasvOptions.PasvMaxPort
member.summary: Gets or sets maximum port number to use for passive ftp.
member.remarks: If set, needs to be larger than PasvMinPort.

member.name: P:FubarDev.FtpServer.SimplePasvOptions.PublicAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the address published to clients for PASV connections.
member.remarks: This may be necessary if you are behind a forwarding firewall, for example.
